_comment0: Contributors: IceFairyCirno, Logan_Haiz, BKCake, xwdit, TEGTianFan, Gigahertz
vivecraft.key.hotbarSwipeX: 滑动选择物品栏（向左/向右）
vivecraft.key.hotbarSwipeY: 滑动选择物品栏（向上/向下）
vivecraft.key.teleportFallback: 当传送移动禁用时使用向手柄朝向移动的移动方式
_comment2: double spacing is intentional, to get minecraft to sort them right
_comment6: Buttons that lead to the screen
vivecraft.options.screen.gui.button: 游戏界面及图形界面选项……
vivecraft.options.TOUCH_HOTBAR: 已启用可触摸的快捷栏
vivecraft.options.HANDHELD_CAMERA_RENDER: 手持相机显示屏解析度
vivecraft.options.HUD_SCALE.tooltip:
视野内状态栏(HUD)占据的相对大小。
是相对单位，不是具体大小也不会影响FOV或者其它什么。
vivecraft.options.HUD_DISTANCE.tooltip:
悬浮的状态栏(HUD)与玩家身体之间的距离；HUD的相对大小不会被这个设置所改变。
以现实中的米（m）为单位（而不是以一个方块为单位）
[PS：在Vivecraft中，默认一个方块为1米，而Java版客户端可以通过改变视角调整观感。]
vivecraft.options.HUD_LOCK_TO.tooltip:
(HUD:状态栏，包括物品栏和生命值等内容)
指定HUD的锁定位置！
手柄上方：HUD会出现在你的副手(默认左手)上方。
头部：HUD会出现并锁定在你的头显视野中！
手臂(推荐)：HUD被设置在你的副手手腕内侧。
[转动你的手腕！当你看向它时它便会出现！]
vivecraft.options.HUD_OPACITY.tooltip:
调整状态栏(HUD)和用户界面(UI)在游戏内的透明度
【0.15透明←[]→完全不透明(默认)】
vivecraft.options.RENDER_MENU_BACKGROUND:
设置游戏内呼出的菜单(GUI)是否有一个半透明的背景
开：呼出的菜单会带有按钮和半透明的背景
关：呼出游戏内菜单时，只会出现按钮（推荐）
vivecraft.options.HUD_OCCLUSION.tooltip:
设置状态栏(HUD)是否会被遮挡。
开(默认)：HUD会被游戏内的物体方块所遮挡，乃至完全隐藏。
关：HUD不会被游戏内的物体方块所遮挡。
vivecraft.options.MENU_ALWAYS_FOLLOW_FAC:
设定主菜单是否会跟随着你的视线而转动！
就座：仅在就座游玩时，启用该功能。
总是：主菜单总是会跟随你的视线转动！
vivecraft.options.CROSSHAIR_SCALE.toolti: 设定游戏内十字指针的大小。
vivecraft.options.MENU_CROSSHAIR_SCALE.t: 设置菜单页面中十字指针的大小。
设置游戏内指针的显示方式：
总是：指针永远会显示，就算HUD被关闭了也是这样！
仅启用状态栏时：指针只会在启用了HUD时显示
从不：从不显示指针
vivecraft.options.CHAT_NOTIFICATIONS.too:
设置当你收到一条聊天信息是将会发生什么【慎用】
无：什么都不会发生~（欸嘿~） 
震动：你的手柄会通过震动提示你
声音：收到消息时会播放信息提示音
全部：不仅手柄会震动，你还会听到提示音
vivecraft.options.CROSSHAIR_SCALES_WITH_:
这个设置决定着指针是否会因为距离而放大缩小。
开：你视野中的指针将会一直保持同一个大小。
关：你视野中的指针大小将会受到距离的影响而变大缩小。
vivecraft.options.RENDER_BLOCK_OUTLINE_M:
设置当你指向一个方块时，方块边缘的显示方式：
总是：方块边缘永远会加黑加粗显示，就算HUD被关闭了也是这样！
仅启用状态栏时：方块边缘会加黑加粗只会在启用了HUD时显示
从不：方块边缘从不加黑加粗显示
_comment22:
vivecraft.options.AUTO_OPEN_KEYBOARD.tooltip=If disabled, the keyboard will only open when you click a text field, or if a text field can't lose focus.

If enabled, the keyboard will open automatically any time a text field comes into focus. Enabling this will cause it to open in unwanted situations with mods.

If set to 'Chat', the keyboard will only open automatically when opening chat.
_comment23: vivecraft.options.AUTO_CLOSE_KEYBOARD.tooltip=If enabled, the keyboard will automatically close, when the screen changes.
vivecraft.options.RADIAL_MODE_HOLD.toolt:
选择扇形菜单的使用方法：
按住：按住扇形菜单按钮时显示扇形按钮菜单；呼出菜单期间把指针移动到选项上并松开按钮来做出选择。
单击：按下扇形菜单按钮呼出菜单，再按一次隐藏；把指针移动到选项上，扣动扳机进行选择。
vivecraft.options.PHYSICAL_KEYBOARD.tool:
选择哪一种VR键盘来打字：
物理碰撞键盘：呼出键盘时，双手会变成亮♂棒♂棒，用他们去戳戳戳、并享受带感的音效吧！【推荐】
指针键盘：将你的手柄指向键盘上的按键，按动扳机就可以输入字符了！
vivecraft.options.PHYSICAL_KEYBOARD_SCAL: 设置物理碰撞键盘的大小，这个数值将改变它的基础大小。
如果启用这项设置，功能方块（比如箱子和熔炉）的
用户操作界面(GUI)将会出现在那个方块的上方；
不启用：GUI将会出现在原本的地方。
vivecraft.options.FSAA.tooltip:
[FSAA]在将画面送往头显之前，使用一种更注重质量的重采样(resampling)方法来处理游戏画面。
最好搭配高渲染倍率使用。
vivecraft.options.MIRROR_DISPLAY.tooltip:
把头显中的画面镜像处理显示在桌面的游戏程式上。可以被设置为：
关：无画面
单眼：传输到头显左/右眼镜片的画面
双眼：同时显示传输到头显左眼和右眼镜片的画面
第一人称视角{影响帧数}：渲染整合双眼画面
第三人称视角{影响帧数}：从侧后方45°向下俯视的视角
MR混合现实模式{影响帧数}：【慎用】
vivecraft.options.MIRROR_EYE.tooltip:
（在裁切模式和单眼模式中）
使用传输到头显里哪个镜片中的画面？
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_KEY_COLO:
在MR混合现实模式中被填充到”透明“区域的颜色。
系统会过滤掉游戏中和这个颜色相配的一些颜色，防止画面看起来怪怪的。
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_RENDER_H:
在MR混合现实模式中渲染你的双手。
仅调整是否渲染你所使用的人物的双手；
人物模型的双手皮肤和手中所持有的物品都会被渲染。
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_UNITY_LI:
在以下两个选项中选择：
Unity式的一分四窗口显示（例如：左下第三人称，右下第一人称）
3+1（Side-by-Side）式的一分二窗口显示
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_UNDISTOR:
把一个无形变的画面渲染到一分四的显示画面中需要【额外的】一次渲染过程；
否则将使用头显某个镜片中的画面（带黑边）。
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_ALPHA_MA:
在Unity布局中：
如果选择”是“，将绘制一个灰度alpha蒙版到右上象限(就像Unity应用界面那样)用于蒙版前景层。
否则，前景色将以关键色绘制，以配合颜色关键效果使用。
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_FOV.tool: 在MR混合现实模式中使用的视野角度（FOV）
vivecraft.options.WALK_UP_BLOCKS.tooltip:
这个选项允许你设置角色不用跳就能上一格高的方块的能力。
[快捷键：右侧Ctrl+B]
§c警告！可能会触发多人服务器中的防作弊系统！
关：(默认)你需要跳跃来登上一格高的方块
开：你不用跳，只要行走就能上到一格高的方块。也许可以减轻一些自由移动模式带来的晕眩
vivecraft.options.MOVEMENT_MULTIPLIER.to:
调整这个数值，可以让你比默认设置移动地慢一些。这也许可以帮助你减轻一些自由移动模式带来的晕眩感。
§c警告！改变这个设置可能会触发多人服务器防作弊程序！
默认设置为Minecraft标准移动速度(1.0)
vivecraft.options.INERTIA_FACTOR.tooltip:
选项：
无<一般<很大<更大
设置玩家在单人模式中移动的惯性。惯性越低，加速度越大，移动灵敏度更高；反之亦然。
高惯性也许可以减轻一些玩家在使用自由移动模式时的晕眩感，但在使用的时候请小心悬崖！
默认设置为”一般“，即标准Minecraft玩家的移动方式
该设置目前不会影响玩家在岩浆、水中的动作和跳跃动作。
vivecraft.options.SIMULATE_FALLING.toolt:
启用该设置后，使用传送移动模式的玩家如果脚下没有方块的话，他们将会摔个嘴啃泥！
不过与此同时，玩家也可以跳跃了。（是谁赢了呢emm）
vivecraft.options.WEAPON_COLLISION.toolt:
启用后，你可以在Vivecraft中挥动手臂来采掘方块、攻击怪物！
如果选择”自动“：在生存模式中该项被设置为启用，在创造模式中该项被设置为禁用
_comment24: vivecraft.options.FEET_COLLISION.tooltip=Enables hitting blocks and entities in roomscale with your feet.\n§6Needs Full Body Tracking to work.\n§6Needs 'Weapon Collision' enabled to work.
_comment25: vivecraft.options.SWORD_BLOCK_COLLISION.tooltip=Enables hitting blocks with swords that can be mined or instantly broken by them.\n§6Has no effect when 'Weapon Collision' is disabled
_comment26: vivecraft.options.ONLY_SWORD_COLLISION.tooltip=If enabled, only swords cause block/entity damage.
_comment27: vivecraft.options.REDUCED_PLAYER_REACH.tooltip=If enabled, reduces the roomscale reach for hitting other players, to avoid accidental hits.
vivecraft.options.ALLOW_CRAWLING.tooltip: 如果启用这个功能，玩家将可以钻过仅有一格高的空间
vivecraft.options.LIMIT_TELEPORT.tooltip: 如果启用该设置，传送移动在生存模式中将会受到限制。你不能使用传送从你站立的方块边缘传送到你头顶的方块上；传送移动也会消耗食物；传送移动将会内置一个隐藏的、随时间回复的能量条，能量越多，可以传送的距离越远。
vivecraft.options.REVERSE_HANDS.tooltip:
切换主手（默认主手为右手）
开：左手为主手
关：右手为主手
切换主手后，重启游戏以应用双手键位的互换；同时请确认你在SteamVR中选择了默认键位设置(default bindings)
_comment28:
vivecraft.options.REVERSE_BOW.tooltip=Swaps the roomscale bow draw hand.
  ON: Non dominant hand draws
  OFF: Dominant hand draws

Only works if the server plugin/mod is up to date.
_comment29: vivecraft.options.AIM_DEVICE.tooltip=Specifies which device to use, to aim the crosshair.
_comment30:
vivecraft.options.THIRDPERSON_ITEMTRANSFORMS.tooltip=Determines how held items are transformed.
  ON: Use thirdperson transforms unmodified
  OFF: Use firstperson transforms customized

thirdperson transforms may be better for modded items.
_comment31: vivecraft.options.THIRDPERSON_ITEMTRANSFORMS_CUSTOM.tooltip=Determines how held items with 'Custom Model Data' are transformed.\n  ON: Use thirdperson transforms unmodified\n  OFF: Use firstperson transforms customized
vivecraft.options.STENCIL_ON.tooltip:
【屏幕黑边】
开启后在频幕上显示镜片黑边，遮盖头显镜片外视野范围外的区域。
可以略微增加帧数。
vivecraft.options.BCB_ON.tooltip:
通过在地面上显示一个方形的影子来显示你的位置判定。
-它可是你的好♂兄♂弟
-啊♂？乖♂乖♂站♂好♂
vivecraft.options.WORLD_SCALE.tooltip:
通过调整倍率来放大缩小玩家！
数值调高会让你从巨人的视角看世界！
调小来体验《格列佛游记（Gulliver's Travels）》里 小人国 的视角！
娱乐功能，如果可以的话最好不要调整~
vivecraft.options.WORLD_ROTATION.tooltip:
微调所使用头显的旋转值
如果能够跟某个按键绑定的话会更有用
可以使用方向键”←“”→“进行调节
vivecraft.options.WORLD_ROTATION_INCREME: 调整人物旋转时旋转的角度。
vivecraft.options.TOUCH_HOTBAR.tooltip: 如果启用这个设置，你将可以通过触摸物品栏的方式来选择上面的东西。
vivecraft.options.PLAY_MODE_SEATED.toolt:
站立游玩或就座游玩
站立游玩可高级多了（笑）
vivecraft.options.RENDER_SCALEFACTOR.too:
游戏的渲染倍率，只与头显镜片中的画面有关。
更高的值将会带来更好的游戏体验，与此同时会吃掉大部分性能导致帧数下降。
vivecraft.options.MONO_FOV.tooltip:
调整视野角度（FOV）
仅影响无形变(undistorted)模式下镜像处理出来显示在桌面上的画面
_comment32: vivecraft.options.MIRROR_CENTER_SMOOTH.tooltip=Smooths the HMD position and rotation for the mirror over the given time. Reduces sudden changes and jitter.
_comment33: vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_OPENING.tooltip=If turned on, you can open doors, trapdoors and fence gates by hitting them in the opening direction.\n§6Needs 'Weapon Collision' enabled to work.
_comment34: vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_JUMP.tooltip=If turned on, once you jump in real life your player will also jump. Also enables Jump Boots.\nAuto disables jumping when Jump Boots are equipped, to prevent accidental jumps.
vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_SNEAK.toolti: 如果启用这个设置，当你在现实中弯腰低头（降低身体高度）的时候，游戏中你的角色会进入潜行模式！
vivecraft.options.PHYSICAL_GUI.tooltip:
如果启用这项设置，用户图形界面(GUI)将会被可互动的3D模型所取代。
如果启用了背包追踪(Backpack tracking)，把手伸向你的后背将会呼出物品背包。
vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_CLIMB.toolti:
如果打开了该设置项，你就可以用你的双手去攀爬梯子和藤蔓了！
（当个蜘蛛侠，请~）
同时也会启用攀爬爪。
vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_SWIM.tooltip:
如果打开了这个设置，你就在三次元里体会到划水的乐趣了！
（被水淹没，不知所措）
vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_ROW.tooltip:
如果想锻炼手臂的话可以试试
*让我们荡起双桨~小船儿开到陆上~
**也许人会先起飞或者手柄撞到东西上报废吧（笑）
_comment35: vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_DISMOUNT.tooltip=Dismounts from entities, when walking away 1 meter.\nCan have issues with large modded entities.
_comment36: vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_BLOCK_INTERACT.tooltip=Allows activating levers, buttons, chests and such by holding your hand in them, and pressing the interact button
_comment37: vivecraft.options.REALISTIC_ENTITY_INTERACT.tooltip=Allows interacting with entities by holding your hand in them, and pressing the interact button
vivecraft.options.WALK_MULTIPLIER.toolti:
倍乘你现实中一步走出去后，在游戏中移动的距离；
让你可以在不动用移动按键的前提下走得更远一些；
但是可能会导致晕眩
【不建议更改】
vivecraft.options.FREEMOVE_MODE.tooltip:
自由移动模式下人物移动的方向。
控制器：副手(默认左手)手柄前端指向的方向【推荐】
头显：你的VR头显看向的方向
原地摆臂移动：左右转向(Yaw)取决于你的VR手柄(控制器)是怎么甩的，向上向下(Pitch)则取决于你的头显方向。
房间：左右转向(Yaw)取决于你的VR游玩空间的正向。向上向下(Pitch)取决于你的头显。这个设置只适合那些无法追踪到背后、或者只有180度追踪/视野的人（比如不想转身的站立模式玩家）
vivecraft.options.VEHICLE_ROTATION.toolt:
在载具（如船和矿车）中，玩家视角会随着载具旋转而旋转。
别玩太狠了，这个可能会使人失去方向感
vivecraft.options.RESET_ORIGIN.tooltip:
把玩家现在的位置校准为游戏区域中心，并将玩家身高设定为1.62m，稍低于正在使用的头显的高度。
这个设置对于那些就座游玩和使用”不那么精准“的定位系统的玩家来说很有用。
vivecraft.options.X_SENSITIVITY.tooltip: 当你把摇杆（左/右）推到底时，视野旋转的速度
_comment38: vivecraft.options.WORLD_ROTATION_X_SENSITIVITY.tooltip=Speed the view will rotate with smooth rotation.
vivecraft.options.KEYHOLE.tooltip: 设定每一次视角旋转时向左/向右旋转的角度大小
vivecraft.options.FOV_REDUCTION.tooltip:
在移动时，头衔镜片画面中将出现黑边，限制视野范围。
可以明显缓解移动时的眩晕感！
vivecraft.options.FOV_REDUCTION_MIN.tool:
移动时视野范围（FOV）的倍率
（默认0.25，数值越高，移动时的视野范围越大）
vivecraft.options.FOV_REDUCTION_OFFSET.t:
水平补正值
对于某些不同寻常的VR来说，如果开启了FOV移动缓冲的话，请一定要调整这个
把移动时仅存的画面调整到看着舒服就行了！
vivecraft.options.SEATED_HMD.tooltip:
按下W键后人物移动的方向：
可设置为跟随头显看向的方向，或指针指向的方向。
vivecraft.options.SEATED_HUD_XHAIR.toolt:
状态栏(HUD)跟随的对象
选择”头显“时，状态栏将跟随头显视线，始终保持在头显视野内。
选择”指针“时，状态栏将跟随鼠标控制的指针移动。
vivecraft.options.BACKPACK_SWITCH.toolti:
如果启用这个设置：
把你的右控制器伸向脑后，即可快速切换出物品栏的第一个物品，或者切换到你上一次切换的格子！
而用你的左控制器这样做，则可以快速交换你双手所持有的物品！
【是个好功能，请善用！】
vivecraft.options.ANALOG_MOVEMENT.toolti:
如果VR手柄(控制器)上“与移动绑定的键(自由移动模式下是摇杆)”有“可变行程(可变角度)”的话，将根据对应按键(摇杆)的可变行程(可变角度)来控制行走速度。

为了充分地模拟对于行走的控制，最好使用”移动/扫描(Strafe)“或者”移动/旋转视角(Rotate)“设置
_comment39: vivecraft.options.DIGITAL_MOVEMENT_DEADZONE.tooltip=Determines how far an axis input needs to be pressed in non-analog mode to trigger a movement. This is also used for 'Analog Movement' to simulate presses of the movement keys for mod compatibility.
vivecraft.options.AUTO_SPRINT.tooltip:
使用自由移动模式时，摇杆角度一旦达到设定的阈值便会自动触发冲刺。
While using freemove, sprint will automatically activate when the axis reaches the configured threshold.
设置激活自动冲刺的摇杆角度阈值
超过即激发

The axis threshold at which auto-sprint activates.
vivecraft.options.BOW_MODE.tooltip:
你可以设置在什么情况下进行射箭的动作识别
关：从不。（我就是要做按键英雄！）
原版：仅在使用原版弓时使用射箭动作识别；不识别MOD道具。
开：对所有使用"弓"的蓄力动作的物品都启用射箭动作识别。
【请注意该设置最好只用于那些有可交互拉弓、蓄力、射击动作的弓类武器】
【虽然可以上膛，但弩和枪械(+MOD)没有弓(BOW)那样的蓄力射击动作】
vivecraft.options.TELEPORT_DOWN_LIMIT.to:
限制你每次传送能把你送往多低的地方
以方块(blocks)为单位
vivecraft.options.TELEPORT_UP_LIMIT.tool:
限制你每次传送能把你送上多高的地方
以方块(blocks)为单位
vivecraft.options.TELEPORT_HORIZ_LIMIT.t:
限制你传送的水平距离
以方块(blocks)为单位
vivecraft.options.ALLOW_STANDING_ORIGIN_:
允许玩家在”站立游玩模式“下使用”复位“按钮。
这个选项通常是给那些在站立模式下游玩，却又想坐搬个椅子坐着的玩家。
（-说到底就是条懒狗……-懒狗怎么了？看不起懒狗啊？）
vivecraft.options.SEATED_FREE_MOVE.toolt:
选择在就座游玩模式中，你想使用的移动方式

传送移动：按下→松开！使用WASD四键中任意一个键即可进行传送移动！键盘上的”←“”→“方向键可以控制人物视角向左向右旋转！
自由移动：操作方法与JAVA版Minecraft客户端相同。
vivecraft.options.FORCE_STANDING_FREE_MO:
强制使用备用的自由移动模式绑定按键(默认启用按键为左扳机)。
如果想使用更多的移动选项，请在SteamVR设置中”控制器“栏目的”管理控制器按键设置“中进行编辑。

请注意，启用这项设置将禁用传送模式中绑定的触发按键。
vivecraft.options.ALLOW_ADVANCED_BINDING:
显示可以通过SteamVR绑定的额外按键！
可用于绑定攀爬、显示键盘和MR混合显示相关功能！

需要重启SteamVR让改动生效。
vivecraft.options.MENU_WORLD_SELECTION.t:
选择想要作为主菜单背景显示出来的世界！
如果系统没有找到任何自订世界的话，会强制使用官方世界。
vivecraft.options.HRTF_SELECTION.tooltip:
【HRTF=Head Related Transfer Function (3D Audio)】
选择你想使用的HRTF配置文件。HRTF技术可以允许你聆听3D空间音效。
声音质量可能会因为设备和驱动而产生差别。
关：完全禁用HRTF
默认：使用默认的HRTF配置文件
其它：使用某个特殊的HRTF配置文件
vivecraft.options.RELOAD_EXTERNAL_CAMERA: 读取ExternalCamera.cfg文件并重新载入相机配置
vivecraft.options.RIGHT_CLICK_DELAY.tool:
按住扳机时，作右键连击判定，此设置更改右键连击之间游戏刻(tick)的数量
1刻(tick)=1/20秒(sec)
vivecraft.options.ANIMAL_TOUCHING.toolti:
如果开启了这个设置，在你手上未持有武器时，触碰一只被动(passive)的生物(mob)的动作将会判定为鼠标右键（使用物品），而不是鼠标左键（攻击）。
——妈妈再也不用担心我一巴掌掴死半个农场的动物了（草）
vivecraft.options.HANDHELD_CAMERA_RENDER:
设定手持摄像机的解析度，越大的设置会导致更大的图片大小。
当光影启用时不可使用。
§c警告：过高的设置可能会烧坏你的显卡！
谁他妈写的翻译？烧显卡过分了啊
vivecraft.options.MIXED_REALITY_RENDER_C: 显示摄像机的模型（仅在 HMD 视图中）以表示混合现实或第三人称摄像机当前所在的位置。 也可以使用交互绑定来抓取它来移动它。
vivecraft.options.PHYSICAL_KEYBOARD_THEM: 为物理键盘预设的配色方案。 自定义主题可以通过游戏目录中的keyboardtheme.txt 进行编辑。 每次打开键盘时都会重新加载，以允许实时调整。
_comment40: vivecraft.options.KEYBOARD_PRESS_BINDS.tooltip=Whether the keyboard should activate key bindings when typing into thin air.\nBe careful! You might activate things you don't intend to.
_comment41: vivecraft.options.CROSSHAIR_OCCLUSION.tooltip=If enabled, the crosshair is occluded by objects when it is behind them.
_comment42: vivecraft.options.HUD_HIDE.tooltip=Hides the hud during gameplay. Equivalent to pressing F1 in vanilla.
vivecraft.options.SEARCH_TYPE.tooltip:
控制列表菜单上搜索字段的工作方式。
模糊：搜索接近匹配，允较小差异。
精确：搜索精确匹配。
vivecraft.options.hudlock.head: 头
vivecraft.gui.menuworld.loadnew: 加载新的主菜单世界背景
vivecraft.messages.seatedmode: 切换至就座游玩模式将会关闭VR手柄输入。确定要继续吗？
vivecraft.messages.radialmenubind.1: 请确认“打开扇形菜单”的功能已经跟手柄的某个键位绑定。
vivecraft.messages.radialmenubind.2: 在扇形菜单打开的时候按住（键盘上的Shift键）来切换到这一套配置。
_comment50: vivecraft.messages.radialmenubind.3=This is bound to the grip of the pointing controller by default.
vivecraft.messages.controls.1: 键位绑定由SteamVR输入(Input)来控制。
vivecraft.messages.controls.2: 请在SteamVR中的“设置”→“控制器”→“管理控制器按键设置”中进行修改（SteamVR 快捷菜单中也可修改）
vivecraft.messages.controls.3: 必须在SteamVR启动 §o之前 §r§6 运行Steam，§o§6否则键位的绑定和更改不会被保存。
vivecraft.messages.serverplugin: 检测到Vivecraft服务器适应插件(MOD)%s
vivecraft.messages.noserverplugin: 没有检测到Vivecraft服务器适应插件(MOD)，这个服务器也许不支持使用传送移动！已启用有限移动模式！（如果完全无法传送，将切换到备用的自由移动模式！）
vivecraft.messages.calibrateheight: 请在按下菜单键呼出的暂停菜单中校准您的身高。

vivecraft.messages.nosteamvr: 未检测到OpenVR. 您安装SteamVR了吗？
_comment54: vivecraft.messages.outdatedsteamvr=OpenVR failed to initialize needed components. Make sure you are using the latest version of SteamVR.
_comment55:
vivecraft.messages.steamvrInvalidCharacters=Invalid characters in path: 
%s

To fix this error, change your Minecraft game directory to somewhere outside the folder with marked characters.
_comment56:
vivecraft.messages.invalidlwjgl=Unsupported LWJGL version loaded.
Loaded version: §c%s§r
Required version: §2%s§r
Wrong LWJGL version was loaded by: %s
vivecraft.messages.menuworldexportcomple: 世界文件导出完成！区域大小：%d
vivecraft.messages.menuworldexportclient: 警告！正在使用客户端世界渲染器保存主菜单背景世界！数据可能不完整！我们推荐您将主菜单背景世界保存到单人游戏中。
vivecraft.messages.teleportdisabled: 有限移动模式已启用（禁止传送移动）
vivecraft.messages.teleportenabled: 有限移动模式已禁用（允许传送移动）

vivecraft.messages.angles: 俯仰：%.1f 偏航：%.1f 横滚：%.1f
_comment58: vivecraft.messages.airtypingwarning=You are typing without a screen open. If you're trying to use key bindings, enable "Keyboard Presses Bindings" in the VR settings.
_comment60:
vivecraft.messages.gcinfo=Your current garbage collector is %s, which is not optimal for Vivecraft and will likely cause hitching and framerate drops.

Your system appears sufficient to use %s and %s GB or more of heap memory, which is recommended for the smoothest experience. Add %s to your Java arguments to use it.

If you're unsure how to modify your Java arguments, press "%s" below.
_comment73: Buttons that lead to the screen
_comment164: vivecraft.options.LOW_HEALTH_INDICATOR.tooltip=Pulses the screen red, when at low health, to indicate your current health status.
_comment165: vivecraft.options.HIT_INDICATOR.tooltip=Flashes the screen red, when taking damage.
_comment167: vivecraft.options.PORTAL_EFFECT.tooltip=Distorts the screen, when standing in a nether portal.
_comment168: vivecraft.options.FREEZE_EFFECT.tooltip=Tints the screen blue, when the player is freezing.
_comment169: vivecraft.options.PUMPKIN_EFFECT.tooltip=Reduces FOV with an orange border, when wearing a carved pumpkin.
_comment170:
vivecraft.options.SHADER_GUI_RENDER.tooltip=Determines how the GUI is rendered with shaders.
  After Shader: renders the GUI without using the shader, best compatibility. (issues with PTGI HRR)
  Translucent: renders the GUI with shader and transparency. (issues with Sildurs Vibrant)
  Opaque: renders the GUI with shader and opaque
_comment171: vivecraft.options.SHADER_SLOW.tooltip=Auto: Vivecraft will try to only render the shadow pass once per frame. Some shaders need to have it ran for each eye though, so 'Auto' will render it then for every eye.\nOFF: The shadow pass is always rendered.
_comment172: vivecraft.options.SHADER_PATCHING.tooltip=Automatically fixes known shader incompatibilities, this slows down shader loading times slightly though.
_comment173: vivecraft.options.SHADER_SHADOW_MODEL_LIMB_SCALE.tooltip=Determines if the shadow of the main player model should render with full sized limbs, or equal to the first person scale.
_comment174: vivecraft.options.DOUBLE_GUI_RESOLUTION.tooltip=If enabled, GUIs will be rendered at 1440p instead of 720p, greatly increasing sharpness.\nMay be more resource intensive on GPUs with limited memory bandwidth.
_comment175: vivecraft.options.GUI_SCALE.tooltip=The GUI scale to apply when VR is active.
_comment176: vivecraft.options.HUD_MAX_GUI_SCALE.tooltip=If enabled, the HUD will use max GUI Scale, regardless of what is set as 'VR GUI Scale'.
_comment177: vivecraft.options.HUD_WRIST_OFFSET.tooltip=Distance the HUD is off the arm in 'HUD Lock: Wrist' mode.
_comment178: vivecraft.options.GUI_MIPMAPS.tooltip=Using Mipmaps can reduce visual aliasing on GUIs, but also make them appear blurry at shallow angles
_comment179: vivecraft.options.GUI_ANISOTROPIC_FILTERING.tooltip=Anisotropic Filtering reduces the blurriness of mipmaps at shallow angles.\nOnly active if 'Use Mipmaps' is enabled.
_comment181: vivecraft.options.VR_REMEMBER_ENABLED.tooltip=Activates VR on startup, if it was enabled the last time.
_comment182: vivecraft.options.VR_PLUGIN.tooltip=Which VR plugin to use:\n  OpenVR: uses SteamVR as a backend.\n  NullVR: Uses no VR Api and runs the game in VR mode without a headset.
_comment183: vivecraft.options.VR_PLUGIN.disabled.tooltip=§6Cannot be changed while VR is enabled.§r
_comment184:
vivecraft.options.FREEMOVE_FLY_MODE.tooltip=The source for freemove direction when flying.

  Auto: uses the same direction as regular Freemove.
  Controller: Offhand controller pointing direction.
  HMD: Headset look direction.
_comment185: vivecraft.options.SHOW_UPDATES.tooltip=How often an update message should show up in chat.\n  Always: Shows the update message each time a world is loaded.\n  Once: Shows the update message only on the first world load after a new update is out.
_comment186: vivecraft.options.UPDATE_TYPE.tooltip=Specifies what updates should trigger a notification.
_comment187:
vivecraft.options.SHOW_PLUGIN.tooltip=When the "server mod detected" message should show up in chat.
  Always: Shows the message on single/multiplayer.
  Server Only: Only shows the message in multiplayer.
  Never: Never shows the message.
_comment188: vivecraft.options.SHOW_PLUGIN_MISSING.tooltip=How often the "server mod not detected" message should show up in chat.\n  Always: Shows the message on server join and dimension/server change.\n  Once: Only shows the message when joining a server.
_comment189:
vivecraft.options.SHOW_SERVER_VR_CHANGES.tooltip=When the message, to notify about non-default server gameplay settings, should be shown in chat.
  Always: Shows the message on single/multiplayer.
  Server Only: Only shows the message in multiplayer.
  Never: Never shows the message.
_comment190: vivecraft.options.CHAT_MESSAGE_STENCIL.tooltip=Prints a message in chat, when another mod is detected, that also uses the stencil buffer.
_comment191: vivecraft.options.VR_HOTSWITCH.tooltip=Hotswitching switches to NONVR when the headset is taken off.\nIf this setting is off, the game will always be in VR mode, when VR is enabled
_comment192: vivecraft.options.INGAME_BINDINGS_IN_GUI.tooltip=Allows for all In-Game bindings to be used in menus, this can cause unwanted double presses.
_comment193: vivecraft.options.MENU_WORLD_FALLBACK.tooltip=If Menuworlds are disabled or not loaded yet, this fallback will be shown instead.
_comment194: vivecraft.options.MIRROR_CROP.tooltip=Specifies how much of the VR image gets cropped. The default 15%% hides the stencil pretty good. If you play without stencil, you can reduce this, to get a bigger FOV for the mirror.
_comment195: vivecraft.options.MIRROR_SCREENSHOT_CAMERA.tooltip=If enabled, the screenshot camera will be displayed as the desktop mirror. When the camera is inactive, the currently selected mirror mode is used instead.\nIn mixed reality mode, only applies to the first person viewport in the Unity layout.
_comment196: vivecraft.options.RENDER_DEBUG_HEAD_HITBOX.tooltip=If enabled, a head hitbox will be rendered for all entities when debug hitboxes are shown
_comment197: vivecraft.options.RENDER_DEBUG_DEVICE_AXES.tooltip=If enabled, debug axes will be shown for the local players VR devices.
_comment198: vivecraft.options.RENDER_DEBUG_PLAYER_AXES.tooltip=If enabled, debug axes will be shown for all VR players received from the server.
_comment199: vivecraft.options.SHOW_PLAYER_MODEL.tooltip=Whether the player model should be shown in first person.
_comment200:
vivecraft.options.SHOW_PLAYER_MODEL_ARMS.tooltip=If the VR controller arms or the actual player model arms should be shown. Attaches the HUD to the model arm when they are shown.
 OFF: Doesn't show the model arms at all.
 Shoulders: Shows the shoulders, if the model is set to split.
 Complete: Shows the whole arms.
_comment201: vivecraft.options.SHOW_PLAYER_HANDS.tooltip=Whether the player's hands should be shown in first person, when no player model is shown.
_comment202: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_MODEL_ARMS_SCALE.tooltip=Scales the thickness of the first person model arms.
_comment203: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_MODEL_BODY_SCALE.tooltip=Scales the thickness of the first person model upper body.
_comment204: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_MODEL_LEGS_SCALE.tooltip=Scales the thickness of the first person model legs.
_comment205:
vivecraft.options.PLAYER_MODEL_TYPE.tooltip=The model type to use for all VR players:
 Vanilla: Doesn't add any new body parts and just animates the vanilla player model.
 Split arms: Splits the arms in two parts so that they can bend/separate.
 Split arms/legs: Same as 'Split arms', but also for the legs.
_comment206: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_LIMBS_CONNECTED.tooltip=When enabled, connects the limbs of the split arms/legs model, to simulate an elbow/knee.
_comment207: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_LIMBS_LIMIT.tooltip=When enabled, arm/leg length is limited, and they stay connected.\nWhen disabled, the arms/legs can split apart when the distance is farther than the model length.
_comment208: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_WALK_ANIM.tooltip=Whether the Vanilla walk animation should be shown on top of feet trackers.
_comment209: vivecraft.options.PLAYER_ARM_ANIM.tooltip=Swings the player's arm when attacking, using items or interacting.
_comment210: vivecraft.options.APPLY_PLAYER_WORLDSCALE.tooltip=Whether player models should scale with their set worldscale.\n ON: Player models will change size with the players worldscale setting.\n OFF: Player models will be default size, just the arms are at their actual position.
_comment211: vivecraft.options.RENDER_DEBUG_TRACKERS.tooltip=Shows the raw tracker positions with labels.
_comment212:
vivecraft.options.MAIN_PLAYER_DATA.tooltip=Determines what data is used to animate the main player model.
Realtime: Creates fresh data every frame for low latency.
Local: Interpolates the data that is sent to the server every tick.
Server: Interpolates the data received from the server, 'sendDataToOwner' needs to be enabled on the server for this.
_comment213: vivecraft.options.STENCIL_BUFFER_DISABLE.tooltip=When enabled, the eye stencil just draws the black overlay, without using a stencil buffer. Enable this when the eye stencil is causing issues with mods, and you want to keep the eye stencil enabled.
_comment214: vivecraft.options.RADIAL_NUMBER.tooltip=Number of buttons available in the radial menu.
_comment215: vivecraft.options.VR_CLOSE_WITH_RUNTIME.tooltip=When enabled, closes the game when the VR runtime closes/crashes.\nWhen disabled, keeps the game open and just disables VR mode.
_comment216: vivecraft.options.OSC_TRACKER_PORT.tooltip=Network Port used to receive FBT data from other applications over the OSC protocol.
_comment217: vivecraft.options.MODIFY_PAUSE_MENU.tooltip=When enabled, adds additional buttons to the pause menu for ease of use.\nWhen disabled, the pause menu stays untouched
_comment218: vivecraft.options.screen.blocklist.tooltip=List of servers that will only be joinable when VR is disabled. All Vivecraft functionality will be disabled while playing on a server that is on this list.
_comment219: vivecraft.options.RENDER_DEBUG_GAMEPLAY_TRACKER.tooltip=If enabled, shows some debug info for gameplay trackers that are used for roomscale actions.
_comment220: vivecraft.options.GAMEPLAY_TRACKER_TO_RENDER.tooltip=Determines which gameplay tracker should show debug info.
_comment221: vivecraft.options.CONTROLLER_TRANSFORM.tooltip=Determines which rotation transforms the controllers should use.\nAUTO will ask the VR Runtime for the rotation transforms.
_comment222: vivecraft.options.FULL_RELOAD_ON_INIT.tooltip=Forces a full resource reload when toggling VR, at the cost of longer wait times.\nThis can fix some issues with Mods that reinitialize some stuff only on a full resource reload.
_comment225: vivecraft.messages.novrhotswitchinglegacy=Legacy Vivecraft server mod detected. This Server does not support VR hot switching, you can only change it in the main menu.
_comment226: vivecraft.messages.novrhotswitching=This Server has VR hot switching disabled, you can only change it in the main menu.
_comment227: vivecraft.messages.vrhotswitchinginfo=VR Hotswitching enabled: Put on your headset to switch to VR
_comment228: vivecraft.messages.noheadaimserverplugin=This server uses an older Vivecraft server mod. This will cause 'Controller Aim' to be forced for certain items.
_comment229: vivecraft.messages.updateAvailable=§a[Vivecraft]§r Update available: %s. click for more details.
_comment237: vivecraft.messages.optifineaa=Optifine antialiasing is not compatible with VR. To use VR disable antialiasing and restart the game.
_comment239: vivecraft.messages.stencil=§a[Vivecraft]§r A different mod uses the stencil buffer, if you run into weird rendering issues, try disabling the Eye Stencil in: %s\nYou can disable this message in: %s
_comment240: vivecraft.messages.slowshader=§a[Vivecraft]§r The selected shader uses features, that need the shadows to be processed for every render pass. §6This might be slow.§r
_comment241: vivecraft.messages.menuworldshaderdisable=§a[Vivecraft]§r Temporarily disabling shaders to load the Menuworld.
_comment244: vivecraft.messages.blocklist.title=Server is on the Vivecraft Server Blocklist
_comment245: vivecraft.messages.blocklist=The selected Server '%s' is on the Vivecraft Server Blocklist.\nContinuing to join will completely disable Vivecraft.
_comment246: vivecraft.messages.fabulousFailed=§a[Vivecraft]§r §cFabulous VR shader failed to compile, check the log for the full error.
_comment250: vivecraft.message.worldscaleOutOfRange.title=Total VR world scale out of range
_comment251: vivecraft.message.worldscaleOutOfRange=World Scale is limited by the server from %1$s to %2$s.\nTo play on this server, reset the world scale in %3$s to §a1x§r.
_comment253:
vivecraft.messages.fbtcalibration=Look forward and stand straight up with the feet together.
Then hold your arms to the side, until they show as §2green§r.
Then press the interact key on both controllers to confirm.
(by default bound to the triggers)
_comment254: vivecraft.messages.fbtcalibration.unlabeledTrackers=§6Unlabeled Trackers in use, calibration will be temporary!
_comment255: vivecraft.messages.fbtcalibration.unlabeledTrackersConfirm=§6Unlabeled Trackers used!\nCheck that the trackers got assigned correctly before confirming!
_comment257: vivecraft.messages.calibratefbtchat=FBT trackers detected, but not calibrated. To use them, calibrate them in the pause menu.
_comment258: vivecraft.messages.steamvrnotfound=SteamVR couldn't be found, make sure it is installed.
_comment259: vivecraft.messages.steamvrrunningflatpak=You seem to be running Minecraft with a launcher that is installed with flatpak. Because of flatpak isolation, they can't talk to SteamVR, so try switching to a launcher that is installed without flatpak.
_comment260: vivecraft.messages.serversettingsnotavailable=§6You are currently playing on a server. Server settings can only be changed on the client that is hosting the game.§r\n§6If you are an OP you can use the '/vivecraft-server-config' command on servers with vivecraft to change options.§r
_comment261: vivecraft.messages.serversettingsnotavailablesingle=§6This is a server setting and can only be adjusted in singleplayer.§r\n§6If you are an OP you can use the '/vivecraft-server-config' command on servers with vivecraft to change it.§r
_comment262: vivecraft.messages.nondefaultvrchanges=§a[Vivecraft]§r This server has some gameplay settings set to non-default values. %s
_comment265: vivecraft.messages.noteleport=This server has teleporting explicitly disabled. Restricted movement mode (fallback to free move) has been enabled.
_comment337: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.VRvsVR=Allow Standing VR vs Standing VR Damage
_comment338: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.SEATEDVRvsSEATEDVR=Allow Seated VR vs Seated VR Damage
_comment339: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.VRvsSEATEDVR=Allow Standing VR vs Seated VR Damage
_comment368: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.debug.tooltip=Will log clients that connect with Vivecraft and their Vivecraft version.
_comment369: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.checkForUpdate.tooltip=Will check for new mod versions when an OP logs into the server and sends a system message to them.
_comment370: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.checkForUpdateType.tooltip=What updates to check for.\n r: Release, b: Beta, a: Alpha
_comment371: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.vr_only.tooltip=Set to 'true' to only allow VR players to join the server.\n If enabled, VR hotswitching will be automatically disabled.
_comment372: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.vive_only.tooltip=Set to 'true' to only allow players that have Vivecraft installed to join the server.
_comment373: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.allow_op.tooltip=Set to 'true', to allow server OPs to bypass VR/Vivecraft only settings.
_comment374: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.messageAndKickDelay.tooltip=Seconds to wait before kicking a player or sending the welcome messages.\n The player's client must send the Vivecraft VERSION info in this time.
_comment375: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.vrFun.tooltip=Gives VR Players fun cakes and drinks at random, when they respawn.
_comment376: vivecraft.serverSettings.general.sendDataToOwner.tooltip=Sends the player position data also back to the player that sent it, usually not needed.\n Enable this on a dedicated server when using replay mod or something similar.
_comment377: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.tooltip=Configure messages that are sent when players do specific actions.
_comment378: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.tooltipall=Set message to nothing to not send. e.g., leaveMessage = ""\n Use '%s' in any message for the player name.\n For messages that take two placeholders (i.e., death by mob) use '%1$s' for the player name and '%2$s' for the second placeholder.
_comment380: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.welcomeVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player joins with VR active.
_comment381: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.welcomeNonVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player joins with VR not active.
_comment382: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.welcomeSeated.tooltip=Message sent when a player joins with VR in seated mode.
_comment383: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.welcomeVanilla.tooltip=Message sent when a player joins without vivecraft installed.
_comment384: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.leaveMessage.tooltip=Message sent when a player leaves the server.
_comment385: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.KickViveOnly.tooltip=Message sent to a player when they get kicked because of the 'Vivecraft Only' setting.
_comment386: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.KickVROnly.tooltip=Message sent to a player when they get kicked because of the 'VR Only' setting.
_comment387: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies with VR active.
_comment388: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathNonVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies with VR not active.
_comment389: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathSeated.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies with VR in seated mode.
_comment390: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathVanilla.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies without Vivecraft.
_comment391: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathByMobVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies because of a mob with VR active.
_comment392: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathByMobNonVR.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies because of a mob with VR not active.
_comment393: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathByMobSeated.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies because of a mob with VR in seated mode.
_comment394: vivecraft.serverSettings.messages.deathByMobVanilla.tooltip=Message sent when a player dies because of a mob without Vivecraft.
_comment395: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.creeperSwellDistance.tooltip=Distance at which creepers swell and explode for standing VR players.\n Vanilla distance: 3
_comment396: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.mobAttackRangeAdjustment.tooltip=Adjusts the range in which mobs can use melee attacks against standing VR players.\n This is a reduction to the vanilla range (0.8 blocks), so 0.0 causes no change, and -0.7 means the mobs need to almost touch the player to cause an attack.\n When set very low, mobs might stop right in front of the player without attacking!
_comment397: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.dualWielding.tooltip=Allows vr players to hit/mine with their non-dominant hand items.
_comment398: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bootsArmorDamage.tooltip=Melee damage addition for VR players when hitting with their feet.\n This scales with the armor attribute of the boots, doing one additional damage per Armor level, times this multiplier\n Set to 0.0 to disable.
_comment399: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.projectileInaccuracyMultiplier.tooltip=Projectiles by default have an inaccuracy to not shoot in the same direction all the time.\n With this, the inaccuracy can be adjusted for VR players.\n 1.0 is equal to vanilla, 0.0 is no inaccuracy at all.
_comment400: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.allowFasterBlockBreaking.tooltip=Allows VR players to bypass the vanilla block breaking check, which prevents breaking blocks too fast.
_comment401: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.allowRoomscaleShieldBlocking.tooltip=Allows VR players to block attacks by holding their shield up, without needing to actively use it. This means they can block attacks without needing to slow down.
_comment402: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.allowAttacksWhileBlocking.tooltip=Allows VR players to attack entities, while they are actively using a shield. (This setting does not affect roomscale shield blocking)
_comment403: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.standingMultiplier.tooltip=Archery damage multiplier for VR players in standing mode.\n Set to 1.0 to disable.
_comment404: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.seatedMultiplier.tooltip=Archery damage multiplier for VR players in seated mode.\n Set to 1.0 to disable.
_comment405: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.standingHeadshotMultiplier.tooltip=Headshot damage multiplier for VR players in standing mode.\n Set to 1.0 to disable.
_comment406: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.seatedHeadshotMultiplier.tooltip=Headshot damage multiplier for VR players in seated mode.\n Set to 1.0 to disable.
_comment407: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.vanillaHeadshotMultiplier.tooltip=Headshot damage multiplier for Vanilla/NonVR players.\n Set to 1.0 to disable.
_comment408:
vivecraft.serverSettings.vrChanges.bow.headshotIndicator.tooltip=Indicator to notify players that they got a headshot. Options are:
 "NONE": No indicator.
 "AUDIO": Plays a sound near the shooter.
 "VISUAL": Spawns particles at the hit location.
 "BOTH": Both Audio and Visual indicators.
_comment409: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.notifyBlockedDamage.tooltip=Notifies the player that tried to cause damage, that it was blocked from the server.
_comment410: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.VRvsVR.tooltip=Allows Standing VR players to damage each other.
_comment411: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.SEATEDVRvsSEATEDVR.tooltip=Allows Seated VR players to damage each other.
_comment412: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.VRvsSEATEDVR.tooltip=Allows Standing VR players and Seated VR Players to damage each other.
_comment413: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.VRvsNONVR.tooltip=Allows Standing VR players and Non VR players to damage each other.
_comment414: vivecraft.serverSettings.pvp.SEATEDVRvsNONVR.tooltip=Allows Seated VR players and Non VR players to damage each other.
_comment415: vivecraft.serverSettings.climbey.enabled.tooltip=Allows the use of 'Jump Boots' and 'Climb Claws'.
_comment416:
vivecraft.serverSettings.climbey.blockmode.tooltip=Specifies how the blocks in the blocklist are interpreted. Options are:
 "DISABLED": List is ignored. All blocks are climbable.
 "WHITELIST": Only blocks on the list are climbable.
 "BLACKLIST": All blocks are climbable except those on the list
_comment417: vivecraft.serverSettings.climbey.blocklist.tooltip=List of block names for use with WHITELIST/BLACKLIST block mode.\n Blocks can be of the form 'blockid' for vanilla or 'modid:blockid' for modded blocks
_comment418: vivecraft.serverSettings.crawling.enabled.tooltip=Allows VR players to get into the crawl state by getting low to the ground. Disabling does not prevent vanilla crawling.
_comment419: vivecraft.serverSettings.teleport.enabled.tooltip=Allows VR players to use teleport movement. It is recommended to leave this enabled for players prone to VR sickness.
_comment420: vivecraft.serverSettings.teleport.limitedSurvival.tooltip=Enforces limited teleport range and frequency in Survival.
_comment421: vivecraft.serverSettings.teleport.upLimit.tooltip=Maximum number of blocks players in Survival mode can teleport up. Set to 0 to disable.
_comment422: vivecraft.serverSettings.teleport.downLimit.tooltip=Maximum number of blocks players in Survival mode can teleport down. Set to 0 to disable.
_comment423: vivecraft.serverSettings.teleport.horizontalLimit.tooltip=Maximum number of blocks players in Survival mode can teleport horizontally. Set to 0 to disable.
_comment424: vivecraft.serverSettings.worldScale.limitRange.tooltip=Limit the range of worldscales players are allowed to use.
_comment427: vivecraft.serverSettings.settingOverrides.thirdPersonItems.tooltip=Forces players to use the 'Raw Item Positions' setting
_comment428: vivecraft.serverSettings.settingOverrides.thirdPersonItemsCustom.tooltip=Forces players to use the 'Raw Item Positions' setting, only for items with custom model data/custom item models.
_comment429: vivecraft.serverSettings.vrSwitching.enabled.tooltip=Allows players to switch between VR and NonVR on the fly.\n If disabled, they will be locked to the mode they joined with.
_comment430: vivecraft.serverSettings.debug.debugParticles.tooltip=Will spawn particles at VR players device positions, to indicate the server VR data state.
_comment431: vivecraft.serverSettings.debug.debugParticlesHead.tooltip=Will spawn particles at VR players head position, to indicate the server VR data state.
